We Advocate For Columbus Families In Wrongful Death Cases

When clients come to us following a fatal accident or death as a result of medical malpractice, they are facing what is likely the worst of their fears — the death of a child, spouse, parent or other family member.

It can be difficult to think about tomorrow, let alone think about the months and years ahead, but finding answers and looking at legal recourse options is important to protecting your future and punishing the wrongdoer.

Compassionate Support And Guidance Through The Legal Process

At Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC, our Columbus, Ohio, attorneys have helped many people in your same situation.

We understand that making legal decisions during the grieving process can seem overwhelming. We are here to not only help guide you with the legal aspects of your case, but also to listen and provide counsel during this trying time.

What You Can Expect From Our Legal Team

When families seek out our services, our lawyers talk with family members to fully understand and relate to their loss. They also:

  • Thoroughly investigate the situation to determine the cause and what entity should be held liable for financial hardships the family is enduring and will continue to endure due to their loss
  • Handle the probate process, providing one-on-one guidance for survivors
  • Establish the monetary value of losses sustained, including loss of income from the primary breadwinner and loss of emotional support and companionship
  • Litigate matters if negotiation is not successful to pursue fair compensation

Handling All Types Of Wrongful Death Cases

From fatalities involving surgical mistakes to truck accidents, nursing home negligence and construction accidents, our lawyers have successfully handled these and many more cases for 50 years.

While nothing we do can bring back your loved one, we will do what it takes to help your family move forward.

Free Consultation. No Legal Fees Unless We Recover Compensation For You.

Contact us online or call 614-360-2706 to discuss your specific case in a free, no-obligation consultation. A lawyer will discuss your case, the law and options to pursue.
